hero.title: Ship bold digital products without slowing down
hero.subtitle: Strategy, design, engineering and growth under one accountable partner with measurable outcomes.
hero.point1: From discovery to rollout with product ownership.
hero.point2: Composable design system and resilient engineering.
hero.badgeCopy: Dedicated squads for strategy, design, build and enablement.

pillars.title: Tailored solutions to digitalize your business
pillars.subtitle: Multidisciplinary teams combining research, product design and engineering to deliver measurable value.
pillars.p1Copy: We embed AI and automation into business flows to accelerate delivery and boost quality.
pillars.p2Copy: Research, service design and UI consistent with your brand, ready to scale across web and mobile.
pillars.p3Copy: DevSecOps, observability, testing and cyclical releases to ship robust features.

stats.projectsLabel: Enterprise projects delivered with dedicated squads.
stats.savingsLabel: Average time-to-market reduction with our modular approach.

cards.title: From discovery to continuous growth
cards.subtitle: Blueprints, prototypes, development and operations with one technology partner.

cta.title: We align product, technology and business with measurable roadmaps
cta.subtitle: We run focused discovery, define clear KPIs and ship features that unlock growth and efficiency.

status.title: We monitor delivery, security and support in real time
status.subtitle: Operational dashboards and runbooks shared with business and tech teams.
status.successCopy: Multi-AZ clusters, incident response in minutes and enterprise-grade SLAs.
status.warningCopy: Releases via feature flags, canary and automatic rollback to mitigate risk.
status.errorCopy: Monitoring, alerting and security playbooks co-owned with your team.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This is a placeholder for the privacy policy. Replace with your legal copy.
privacy.dataPoint2: Minimal technical logs for security and performance.
privacy.rightsCopy: Describe how users can exercise access, rectification, deletion, and portability rights.

cookie.descrizione: We use cookies to improve your experience. Choose what to enable.
cookie.essenzialiDescrizione: Required for the site to work and cannot be disabled.
cookie.analisiDescrizione: Help us understand how the site is used.

cookiePolicy.introduzione: This page explains how we use cookies and how you can manage your choices.
cookiePolicy.sezioneTecniciDescrizione: These cookies are indispensable for the site to function and cannot be disabled.
cookiePolicy.sezioneAnalisiDescrizione: They collect aggregated data on site usage to improve features.
cookiePolicy.sezioneMarketingDescrizione: Used for personalization, remarketing and promotional content.
cookiePolicy.gestioneDescrizione: You can change your choices at any time via the banner or the link in the legal notes.
